translated: Benedict XVI (born Joseph Alois Ratzinger), born April 16, 1927 in Marktl am Inn (Bavaria, Germany), is the 265th pope enthroned April 24, 2005.
original: Benoît XVI (né Joseph Alois Ratzinger), né le 16 avril 1927 à Marktl am Inn (Bavière, Allemagne), est le 265e pape, intronisé le 24 avril 2005.
